content: join yarn to the bottom edge with a slip_stitch *chain 2 skip one st slip_stitch in the next st* repeat across the row and finish with a slip_stitch in the st where you made the initial chain 2 break the yarn finishing sew off all loose ends with a darning needle pattern & photos are copyright © cj brady designs/2017 | ravelry cj brady instagram @cjbradydesigns tag projects #cjbradydesigns
